RecordsetFltrCritMonitor.name: RecordsetFltrCritMonitor
RecordsetFltrCritMonitor.description: Monitors whether the value of an asset attribute is within the threshold of a recordset filter criteria (RFC).

AssetId.description: The ID of the asset to link the RFC to.

Description.description: The description of the RFC associated with the recordset filter criteria monitor.

IsWithinThreshold.description: Indicates whether the value of the asset attribute is within the threshold of the RFC.

Name.description: The name of the recordset filter criteria monitor.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date the value was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The date the value was last viewed.

RecordsetFilterCriteriaId.description: The ID of the recordset filter criteria.
